column4: Hi guys, I need a hand with a failed dist-upgrade.  I was running Woddy + Backports, attempted to upgrade to Hoary and I think it's gone pear shaped.
and I don't seem to have a lot of the packages I should have in the list
do I need to set me default dist in apt.conf or something like that?
no idea, i can give you my /etc/apt/* if you want?
and don't forget to install ubuntu-desktop :)
don't want that package, it's a server
anyway, part of the problem is that I can't see that one
ahhh, I think I was missing the pgp stuff
I think that's cured it, thanks for that
